t:
I was relieved when the police only found my dog's body after digging in my backyard, having suspected me of murder.


However my heart sank when they said that they're gonna dig deeper.
c:
They'll never believe that my dog was the actual killer.



#police #suspicion #murder #body #backyard #digging #dog #relief
